definition: to change according to the situation (idiom); pragmatic
to follow/to comply with/varying according to.../to allow/subsequently
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
to change/to become different/to transform/to vary/rebellion

sentences.chinese: 情況有變，我們就該隨機應變。

sentences.english: Satisfying and small excellent decided to heart random strain, let the heart satisfying play both parts Angle.
sentences.chinese: 心怡與小優決定隨機應變，讓心怡一人分飾兩角。

sentences.english: Being flexible and able to adapt to all kinds of situations is attractive.
sentences.chinese: 能夠在各種情形下隨機應變是很吸引人的。

sentences.english: By trimming the sails, he tided over the crisis.
If you encounter a situation that is unfamiliar to you, don't panic., just go with the flow.
sentences.chinese: 即使遇到了不熟悉的狀況也不要驚慌，隨機應變就好。

sentences.english: You need both capital and savoir faire to be a successful entrepreneur.
sentences.chinese: 你同時需要資本和隨機應變才成爲一個成功的企業家。

sentences.english: Highly self-motivated, committed and resourceful at work.
sentences.chinese: 高度自我激勵，踏實地工作並能隨機應變。

sentences.english: The Li bald astute extroversion, according to the circumstance, can achieve success one way or another in front of the reality.
sentences.chinese: 李光頭精明外向，隨機應變，在現實面前左右逢源。

definition: pragmatic/flexible/to act differently in different situations/to accommodate to circumstances
different routes to the same destination (idiom); fig. different means of achieve the same end
to resign oneself to adversity (idiom); to grin and bear it/to submit meekly to insults, maltreatment, humiliation etc
to avoid the important and dwell on the trivial/to keep silent about major charges while admitting minor ones
to curry favor (idiom); playing up to those in power/social climbing
lit. to build a cart behind closed doors/to be overly subjective and disregard the outside world (idiom)
to seize every opportunity/to be full of tricks
